name: 5 Tips for Taking Your Small Business
short_description: Considering the growing globalization of business, technology, and, well, life, it’s hard to really imagine sustaining yourself purely on local markets. More and more small businesses are extending themselves beyond oceanic bounds, thanks primarily to the Internet and social media. Many small businesses hire foreign market solutions consultants to help them along the way, which is a great idea. In addition to the professional advice, though, here are a few tips for those small businesses looking to go global.
summary: Considering the growing globalization of business
